queries: What courses are offered at your college?
answers: We offer B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, and MCA programs.

queries: Can you tell me about the B.Tech program?
answers: B.Tech is a 4-year undergraduate engineering program with various specializations.

queries: What is the duration of the MBA course?
answers: The MBA course is a 2-year full-time program.

queries: How long is the MCA program?
answers: The MCA program is 3 years long.

queries: Is M.Tech available at your institution?
answers: Yes, we offer a 2-year M.Tech program in multiple disciplines.

queries: What is the fee for B.Tech?
answers: The B.Tech program fee is ?1,20,000 per year.

queries: How much does M.Tech cost annually?
answers: The M.Tech fee is ?1,40,000 per year.

queries: What is the MBA tuition fee?
answers: The MBA tuition fee is ?1,50,000 per year.

queries: How much do I pay for MCA per year?
answers: MCA costs ?1,00,000 per year.

queries: Are scholarships available for students?
answers: Yes, we offer merit-based scholarships of up to ?50,000.

queries: What scholarships do you offer?
answers: We offer merit-based and category-based scholarships.

queries: Is there financial aid for economically weaker sections?
answers: Yes, we provide support for EWS and reserved category students.

queries: How can I apply for admission?
answers: You can apply online through our official website and follow the instructions.

queries: Do you conduct any entrance exam for admission?
answers: Yes, admissions are based on an entrance exam followed by counseling.

queries: What are the eligibility criteria for B.Tech?
answers: You need to have completed 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.

queries: What are the eligibility requirements for MBA?
answers: A valid bachelor’s degree and qualifying entrance exam are required.

queries: Can I apply offline?
answers: No, all applications are accepted online only.

queries: When does the admission process start?
answers: The admission process typically begins in April every year.

queries: Do you have a hostel facility?
answers: Yes, we have separate hostels for boys and girls.

queries: Are hostels Wi-Fi enabled?
answers: Yes, all hostels are equipped with high-speed Wi-Fi.

queries: Do hostels have mess facilities?
answers: Yes, hygienic and nutritious food is served in our hostel mess.

queries: How are the placements?
answers: We have a 90% placement rate with top companies visiting our campus.

queries: What companies visit for placement?
answers: Infosys, TCS, Amazon, Wipro, and many others recruit our students.

queries: Is internship support provided?
answers: Yes, we assist students with internship opportunities in reputed firms.

queries: Do you conduct campus drives?
answers: Yes, regular campus drives are organized for final-year students.

queries: What is the average salary offered during placement?
answers: The average salary is around ?6 LPA with the highest going up to ?18 LPA.

queries: Is there any entrance exam for MCA?
answers: Yes, admission to MCA is based on an entrance test and academic merit.

queries: How many seats are there for B.Tech?
answers: We have over 300 seats across B.Tech specializations.

queries: What are the available specializations in B.Tech?
answers: We offer CSE, ECE, ME, CE, and IT in B.Tech.

queries: What documents are needed for admission?
answers: You need marksheets, ID proof, entrance scorecard, and photographs.

queries: What is the application fee?
answers: The application fee is ?1,000, payable online.

queries: Can I pay the fee in installments?
answers: Yes, the annual fee can be paid in two installments.

queries: What modes of fee payment are accepted?
answers: We accept online payments via UPI, net banking, and credit/debit cards.

queries: What’s the college location?
answers: Our college is located in [City], easily accessible by public transport.

queries: Is there transportation available?
answers: Yes, college buses are available from key points in the city.

queries: Are there any student clubs?
answers: Yes, we have technical, cultural, and entrepreneurship clubs.

queries: Do you offer foreign exchange programs?
answers: Yes, selected students can participate in short-term global internships.

queries: What is the college timing?
answers: Classes typically run from 9 AM to 4 PM, Monday to Friday.

queries: Is ragging allowed?
answers: No. Our campus is strictly anti-ragging and under CCTV surveillance.

queries: Is the campus Wi-Fi enabled?
answers: Yes, the entire campus is Wi-Fi enabled for students and staff.

queries: Do you have a library?
answers: Yes, we have a central library with thousands of academic resources.

queries: Can I change my branch after admission?
answers: Branch change is allowed after first year based on academic performance.

queries: Are there any entrance exams conducted by the college itself?
answers: Yes, we conduct an in-house entrance test for some programs.

queries: Do you offer lateral entry for diploma holders?
answers: Yes, diploma holders can apply for lateral entry to the 2nd year of B.Tech.

queries: What is the total cost for an MBA degree?
answers: The total cost for 2 years of MBA is ?3,00,000.

queries: Is placement guaranteed?
answers: While we ensure support, placement depends on student performance.

queries: Are online classes available?
answers: Yes, we offer hybrid learning and online support when needed.

queries: Can international students apply?
answers: Yes, we accept applications from international students.

queries: What is the refund policy for admission fees?
answers: Refunds are available as per UGC guidelines before course commencement.

queries: Are there any sports facilities?
answers: Yes, we have indoor and outdoor sports grounds and equipment.

queries: What is the last date to apply for UG programs?
answers: The last date to apply for undergraduate programs is typically around June 30. Please check the MSRUAS official admissions page for updates.

queries: Are evening or weekend classes available for working professionals?
answers: Yes, MSRUAS offers flexible learning options like part-time or weekend classes for select postgraduate and diploma programs.

queries: What is the minimum eligibility for B.Sc. in Biotechnology?
answers: Candidates must have passed 10+2 with Biology, Physics, and Chemistry as core subjects. A minimum of 50% aggregate marks is typically required.

queries: Is hostel accommodation available on campus?
answers: Yes, MSRUAS provides separate hostel facilities for boys and girls with dining, Wi-Fi, laundry, and security services.

queries: How can I apply for MSRUAS scholarships?
answers: You can apply for scholarships during the admission process. Scholarships are awarded based on academic merit, sports, or socio-economic background.

queries: Are there any entrance exams for admission to MSRUAS?
answers: Some courses may require entrance tests like RUAS-AT or national-level exams. For most UG programs, admission is based on merit in qualifying exams.

queries: Can I get lateral entry into B.Tech programs?
answers: Yes, students with a 3-year diploma in engineering can apply for lateral entry into the 2nd year of B.Tech at MSRUAS.

queries: Is there a counseling process for admissions?
answers: Yes, once applications are reviewed, shortlisted candidates are invited for counseling and document verification.

queries: Does MSRUAS offer international student admissions?
answers: Yes, international students can apply with valid academic transcripts, English proficiency scores (like IELTS/TOEFL), and visa documents.

queries: What documents are required during admission?
answers: You’ll need your 10th & 12th mark sheets, transfer certificate, ID proof, recent passport-size photos, and entrance exam scorecard if applicable.

queries: What is the medium of instruction at MSRUAS?
answers: English is the medium of instruction for all undergraduate and postgraduate programs.

queries: Does the university offer placement support?
answers: Yes, MSRUAS has a dedicated placement cell that provides training, industry tie-ups, and placement opportunities across various sectors.

queries: Are online classes available for any programs?
answers: Some programs may offer online or hybrid learning modes, especially postgraduate diplomas or certificate courses.

queries: Can I switch branches after joining a program?
answers: Branch change may be allowed after the first year, subject to academic performance and availability of seats.

queries: How do I check the status of my admission application?
answers: You can log in to the admission portal using your application number and registered email to check the current status.

queries: What is the fee structure for B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence?
answers: The fee structure for B.Tech in AI & ML varies by academic year. Please visit the official MSRUAS fees page or contact the admissions office for the latest details.

queries: Are there any dual-degree programs offered?
answers: Yes, MSRUAS offers integrated and dual-degree options in engineering and management streams. Check the course catalog for details.

queries: Can I pay the fees in installments?
answers: Yes, the university allows semester-wise installment payments. Some scholarship and financial aid programs may offer further flexibility.

queries: Is there a refund policy if I cancel my admission?
answers: Yes, MSRUAS follows UGC refund guidelines. Refund eligibility depends on the date of withdrawal and applicable deductions.

queries: Does MSRUAS have a medical facility on campus?
answers: Yes, the university has a health center with basic medical care, a resident doctor, and tie-ups with nearby hospitals

queries: What are the career prospects after M.Tech in Robotics?
answers: M.Tech in Robotics graduates can work in automation, defense, aerospace, manufacturing, and R&D sectors. MSRUAS also assists with placements.

queries: Is there a dress code on campus?
answers: While there’s no strict dress code, students are expected to wear modest and appropriate attire. Some departments (like Dental or Pharmacy) may require uniforms.

queries: How do I contact the admissions helpdesk?
answers: You can reach the MSRUAS admissions team via phone, email, or the live chat feature on their website. Timings are usually 9 AM to 5 PM on working days.

queries: Are internships mandatory during the course?
answers: Yes, many UG and PG programs include mandatory internships or industry projects as part of the curriculum.

queries: Can I get admission through sports quota?
answers: MSRUAS offers limited seats under sports quota. You’ll need to provide district/state/national-level certificates and attend trials.

queries: Are there any foreign language courses offered?
answers: Yes, the university offers foreign language electives such as German, French, and Japanese, based on student interest and program.

queries: How many credits are required to graduate?
answers: Typically, UG programs require 160–180 credits, while PG programs range from 70–90 credits, depending on the course structure.

queries: Does the university provide transportation facilities?
answers: Yes, MSRUAS offers bus services across various city routes. Transport fees are separate and depend on the distance from campus.

queries: What kind of extracurricular clubs are available?
answers: Students can join clubs for dance, music, photography, robotics, literature, and entrepreneurship, among others.

queries: Can I defer my admission to next year?
answers: Admission deferment may be granted on valid grounds. You’ll need to submit a formal request to the admissions office before the session starts.
